mean_cn: n. 香料，调味品，风味；  v. 使增添趣味，加香料于
mean_en: a substance (such as pepper or nutmeg) that is used in cooking to add flavor to food and that comes from a dried plant and is usually a powder or seed
sentence: I added some spice to the recipe to make it taste better.
sentence_trans: 我在菜谱里加了些香料，这样料理就会更美味。
